00044 
00046 // ageretm
00047 // The Agere Traffic Manager unit
00048 // - N traffic queues are scheduled with SDWRR scheduling
00049 // - each traffic queue has 8 CoS queues served with strict priority
00050 // - the priority is derived from frame->VlanPriority
00051 // - each CoS queue has buffer management:
00052 //     - tail drop or WRED
00053 // according to SCR and PIR, each connection can set its own
00054 // SCR and PIR, which are met by the Queues for SCR and PIR
00056 
00057 //tolua_begin
00058 class AgereTm : public inxout {
00059   typedef   inxout   baseclass;

00219 // class SdwrrScheduler
00220 // a scheduler with SDWRR scheduling discipline
00222 
00223 //tolua_begin
00224 class SdwrrScheduler : public ino {
00225   
00226 public:
00227   
00228   SdwrrScheduler(root* owner,AgereTmTrafficQueue **tq, int nqueue); // constr.
00229   ~SdwrrScheduler();
00230   
00231   int nTrafficQueue;            // # of traffic queues
00232   int serviceQuantum;   // this is the amount of data in bytes which is
00233                         // served in each list for the connection with the
00234                         // largest weight until switched to the next list
00235                         // serviceQuantum=MaxWeight * MaxPDU / 3
00236   int maxPduSize;
00237   double maxWeight;     // Issue: must this be int or double?
00238   void calculateLimits(void);
00239   //tolua_end
00240   
00241   frame *dequeueFrame(void);
00242   int findNextNonemptyList(int startlist);      // find the next non-empty list
00243                                                 // beginning from the startlist
00244   void enqueueQueue(AgereTmTrafficQueue *tq);   // enqueue new traffic queue
00245   
00246   void late(event* evt) // called each time slot
00247   {
00248     AgereTmTrafficQueue *tq;
00249     
00250     tq = (AgereTmTrafficQueue*) sds.first();
00251     if(tq == NULL)
00252       return;
00253     
00254     if(SimTime >= tq->time) // if this queue is allowed to transmit
00255       {
00256         // take traffic queue from shared dynamic scheduler
00257         tq = (AgereTmTrafficQueue*) sds.dequeue();
00258         enqueueQueue(tq);       // enqueue the traffic queue in the 4 lists
00259       }
00260   };
00261   
00262   root* SchedulerOwner;         // the owner object of this scheduler queue
00263   AgereTmTrafficQueue **TrafficQueue;
00264   uoqueue list[4];              // the 4 lists
00265   uoqueue sds;                  // the shared dynamic scheduler
00266   // for rate limiting of traffic queues
00267   int currentList;
00268   int enqueueList;
00269 };  //tolua_export
